data.text: @austinh52 This is idiotic. It's just amazing the amount of misinformation that's out there. The idea that you're better off w Covid than the vaccine is just ... conspiracy-theory-level unhinged.

@austinh52 I would advise you to consult your PCP for their opinion. In my case (admittedly we are both over 40), he and I have both been vaccinated. He received his as soon as he could back in December.
